description: Metadata a multidimensional photoemission spectroscopy experiment.

metaInfos.description: Shape of the None/Null object
metaInfos.name: none_shape

metaInfos.description: Number of name segments in the experiment location
metaInfos.name: number_of_location_names

metaInfos.description: Name of the beamline the experiment took place.
metaInfos.name: general_beamline

metaInfos.description: Name or model of the pump light source.
metaInfos.name: general_source_pump

metaInfos.description: Name or model of the probe light source.
metaInfos.name: general_source_probe

metaInfos.description: Number of axes in the measurement hardware.
metaInfos.name: number_of_axes

metaInfos.description: Names of the axes in the measurement hardware.
metaInfos.name: general_measurement_axis

metaInfos.description: Names of the axes in physical terms.
metaInfos.name: general_physical_axis

metaInfos.description: Repetition rate of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_repetition_rate

metaInfos.description: Pulse duration of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_pulse_duration

metaInfos.description: Center wavelength of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_wavelength

metaInfos.description: Spectrum of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_spectrum

metaInfos.description: Photon energy of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_photon_energy

metaInfos.description: Full-width at half-maximum (FWHM) of the pump source size at or closest to the sample position.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_size

metaInfos.description: Fluence of the pump source at or closest to the sample position.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_fluence

metaInfos.description: Polarization of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_polarization

metaInfos.description: Total bunch number of the pump source.
metaInfos.name: source_pump_bunch

metaInfos.description: Repetition rate of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_repetition_rate

metaInfos.description: Pulse duration of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_pulse_duration

metaInfos.description: Center wavelength of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_wavelength

metaInfos.description: Number of pixel elements in the spectrum.
metaInfos.name: length_of_spectrum

metaInfos.description: Spectrum of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_spectrum

metaInfos.description: Photon energy of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_photon_energy

metaInfos.description: Full-width at half-maximum (FWHM) of the probe source size at or closest to the sample position.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_size

metaInfos.description: Fluence of the probe source at or closest to the sample position.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_fluence

metaInfos.description: Polarization of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_polarization

metaInfos.description: Total bunch number of the probe source.
metaInfos.name: source_probe_bunch

metaInfos.description: Full-width at half-maximum (FWHM) of the pump-probe cross-correlation function.
metaInfos.name: source_temporal_resolution

metaInfos.description: Voltage between the extractor and the sample.
metaInfos.name: detector_extractor_voltage

metaInfos.description: Distance between the sample and the detector entrance.
metaInfos.name: detector_work_distance

metaInfos.description: Number of electron lenses in the electron detector.
metaInfos.name: number_of_lenses

metaInfos.description: Set of names for the electron-optic lenses.
metaInfos.name: detector_lens_names

metaInfos.description: Set of electron-optic lens voltages.
metaInfos.name: detector_lens_voltages

metaInfos.description: Drift distance of the time-of-flight tube.
metaInfos.name: detector_tof_distance

metaInfos.description: Number of time-of-flight (TOF) drift tube voltage values in the electron detector.
metaInfos.name: number_of_tof_voltages

metaInfos.description: Voltage applied to the time-of-flight tube.
metaInfos.name: detector_tof_voltages

metaInfos.description: Voltage bias applied to sample.
metaInfos.name: detector_sample_bias

metaInfos.description: Detector magnification.
metaInfos.name: detector_magnification

metaInfos.description: Number of detector voltage settings in the electron detector.
metaInfos.name: number_of_detector_voltages

metaInfos.description: Voltage applied to detector.
metaInfos.name: detector_voltages

metaInfos.description: Description of the detector type (e.g. ‘MCP’, ‘CCD’, ‘CMOS’, etc.).
metaInfos.name: detector_type

metaInfos.description: Number of detector sensor size dimensions (depending on the number of sensors).
metaInfos.name: number_of_sensor_sizes

metaInfos.description: Size of each of the imaging sensor chip on the detector.
metaInfos.name: detector_sensor_size

metaInfos.description: Number of imaging sensor chips on the detector.
metaInfos.name: detector_sensor_count

metaInfos.description: Pixel size of the imaging sensor chip on the detector.
metaInfos.name: detector_sensor_pixel_size

metaInfos.description: Number of the momentum calibration parameters for the detector.
metaInfos.name: number_of_momentum_calibration_coefficients

metaInfos.description: Pixel x axis to kx momentum calibration.
metaInfos.name: detector_calibration_x_to_momentum

metaInfos.description: Pixel y axis to ky momentum calibration.
metaInfos.name: detector_calibration_y_to_momentum

metaInfos.description: Number of the energy calibration parameters for the detector.
metaInfos.name: number_of_energy_calibration_coefficients

metaInfos.description: Time-of-flight to energy calibration.
metaInfos.name: detector_calibration_tof_to_energy

metaInfos.description: Translation stage position to pump-probe delay calibration.
metaInfos.name: detector_calibration_stage_to_delay

metaInfos.description: Number of the other calibration parameters for the detector.
metaInfos.name: number_of_other_calibration_coefficients

metaInfos.description: Conversion factor between other measured and physical axes.
metaInfos.name: detector_calibration_other_converts

metaInfos.description: Momentum resolution of the detector.
metaInfos.name: detector_momentum_resolution

metaInfos.description: Spatial resolution of the source.
metaInfos.name: detector_spatial_resolution

metaInfos.description: Energy resolution of the detector.
metaInfos.name: detector_energy_resolution

metaInfos.description: Physical state of the sample.
metaInfos.name: sample_state_of_matter

metaInfos.description: Chemical purity of the sample.
metaInfos.name: sample_purity

metaInfos.description: Surface termination of the sample (if crystalline).
metaInfos.name: sample_surface_termination

metaInfos.description: Sample layer or bulk structure.
metaInfos.name: sample_layers

metaInfos.description: Stacking order of the solid surface (if crystalline).
metaInfos.name: sample_stacking_order

metaInfos.description: CAS registry number of the sample’s chemical content.
metaInfos.name: sample_chemical_id_cas

metaInfos.description: Pressure surrounding the sample at the time of measurement.
metaInfos.name: sample_pressure

metaInfos.description: Sample growth method.
metaInfos.name: sample_growth_method

metaInfos.description: Sample preparation method.
metaInfos.name: sample_preparation_method

metaInfos.description: Name of the sample vendor.
metaInfos.name: sample_vendor

metaInfos.description: Material of the substrate the sample has immediate contact with.
metaInfos.name: sample_substrate_material

metaInfos.description: State of matter of the substrate material.
metaInfos.name: sample_substrate_state_of_matter

metaInfos.description: Name of the substrate vendor.
metaInfos.name: sample_substrate_vendor
